00052         function HTMLFilterOutput($str)
00053                 {
00054                 $str = str_replace('__CAS_VERSION__',$this->getServerVersion(),$str);
00055                 $str = str_replace('__PHPCAS_VERSION__',phpCAS::getVersion(),$str);
00056                 $str = str_replace('__SERVER_BASE_URL__',$this->getServerBaseURL(),$str);
00057                 echo $str;
00058                 }

00181         var $_strings;
00182         
00192         function getString($str)
00193                 {
00194                 // call CASclient::getLang() to be sure the language is initialized
00195                 $this->getLang();
00196                 
00197                 if ( !isset($this->_strings[$str]) ) {
00198                         trigger_error('string `'.$str.'\' not defined for language `'.$this->getLang().'\'',E_USER_ERROR);
00199                 }
00200                 return $this->_strings[$str];
00201                 }

00212         function setLang($lang)
00213                 {
00214                 // include the corresponding language file
00215                 include_once(dirname(__FILE__).'/languages/'.$lang.'.php');
00216                 
00217                 if ( !is_array($this->_strings) ) {
00218                         trigger_error('language `'.$lang.'\' is not implemented',E_USER_ERROR);
00219                 }
00220                 $this->_lang = $lang;
00221                 }

00302         function getServerBaseURL()
00303                 { 
00304                 // the URL is build only when needed
00305                 if ( empty($this->_server['base_url']) ) {
00306                         $this->_server['base_url'] = 'https://'
00307                                 .$this->getServerHostname()
00308                                 .':'
00309                                 .$this->getServerPort()
00310                                 .$this->getServerURI();

00324         function getServerLoginURL($gateway=false,$renew=false) {
00325                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
00326                 // the URL is build only when needed
00327                 if ( empty($this->_server['login_url']) ) {
00328                         $this->_server['login_url'] = $this->getServerBaseURL();
00329                         $this->_server['login_url'] .= 'login?service=';
00330                         // $this->_server['login_url'] .= preg_replace('/&/','%26',$this->getURL());
00331                         $this->_server['login_url'] .= urlencode($this->getURL());
00332                         if($renew) {
00333                                 // It is recommended that when the "renew" parameter is set, its value be "true"
00334                                 $this->_server['login_url'] .= '&renew=true';
00335                         } elseif ($gateway) {
00336                                 // It is recommended that when the "gateway" parameter is set, its value be "true"
00337                                 $this->_server['login_url'] .= '&gateway=true';
00338                         }
00339                 }
00340                 phpCAS::traceEnd($this->_server['login_url']);
00341                 return $this->_server['login_url'];
00342         }

00397         function getServerServiceValidateURL()
00398                 { 
00399                 // the URL is build only when needed
00400                 if ( empty($this->_server['service_validate_url']) ) {
00401                         switch ($this->getServerVersion()) {
00402                                 case CAS_VERSION_1_0:
00403                                         $this->_server['service_validate_url'] = $this->getServerBaseURL().'validate';
00404                                         break;
00405                                 case CAS_VERSION_2_0:
00406                                         $this->_server['service_validate_url'] = $this->getServerBaseURL().'serviceValidate';
00407                                         break;
00408                         }
00409                 }
00410                 //      return $this->_server['service_validate_url'].'?service='.preg_replace('/&/','%26',$this->getURL()); 
00411                 return $this->_server['service_validate_url'].'?service='.urlencode($this->getURL()); 
00412                 }
00418         function getServerSamlValidateURL()

00420         phpCAS::traceBegin();

00426                         break;

00429         phpCAS::traceEnd($this->_server['saml_validate_url'].'?TARGET='.urlencode($this->getURL()));

00518         function isHttps() {
00519                 //if ( isset($_SERVER['HTTPS']) && !empty($_SERVER['HTTPS']) ) {
00520                 //0.4.24 by Hinnack
00521                 if ( isset($_SERVER['HTTPS']) && !empty($_SERVER['HTTPS']) && $_SERVER['HTTPS'] == 'on') {
00522                         return true;
00523                 } else {
00524                         return false;
00525                 }
00526         }
00527         
00528         // ########################################################################
00529         //  CONSTRUCTOR
00530         // ########################################################################
00545         function CASClient(
00546                                            $server_version,
00547                                            $proxy,
00548                                            $server_hostname,
00549                                            $server_port,
00550                                            $server_uri,
00551                                            $start_session = true) {
00552                 
00553                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
00554                 
00555                 // the redirect header() call and DOM parsing code from domxml-php4-php5.php won't work in PHP4 compatibility mode
00556                 if (version_compare(PHP_VERSION,'5','>=') && ini_get('zend.ze1_compatibility_mode')) {
00557                         phpCAS::error('phpCAS cannot support zend.ze1_compatibility_mode. Sorry.');
00558                 }
00559                 // skip Session Handling for logout requests and if don't want it'
00560                 if ($start_session && !$this->isLogoutRequest()) {
00561                         phpCAS::trace("Starting session handling");
00562                         // Check for Tickets from the CAS server
00563                         if (empty($_GET['ticket'])){
00564                                 phpCAS::trace("No ticket found");
00565                                 // only create a session if necessary
00566                                 if (session_id() !== '') {
00567                                         phpCAS::trace("No session found, creating new session");
00568                                         session_start();
00569                                 }
00570                         }else{
00571                                 phpCAS::trace("Ticket found");
00572                                 // We have to copy any old data before renaming the session
00573                                 if (session_id() !== '') {
00574                                         phpCAS::trace("Old active session found, saving old data and destroying session");
00575                                         $old_session = $_SESSION;
00576                                         session_destroy();      
00577                                 }else{
00578                                         session_start();
00579                                         phpCAS::trace("Starting possible old session to copy variables");
00580                                         $old_session = $_SESSION;
00581                                         session_destroy();      
00582                                 }
00583                                 // set up a new session, of name based on the ticket
00584                                 $session_id = preg_replace('/[^\w]/','',$_GET['ticket']);
00585                                 phpCAS::LOG("Session ID: " . $session_id);
00586                                 session_id($session_id);
00587                                 session_start();
00588                                 // restore old session vars
00589                                 if(isset($old_session)){
00590                                         phpCAS::trace("Restoring old session vars");
00591                                         $_SESSION = $old_session;
00592                                 }
00593                         }
00594                 }else{
00595                         phpCAS::trace("Skipping session creation");
00596                 }
00597 
00598                 
00599                 // are we in proxy mode ?
00600                 $this->_proxy = $proxy;
00601                 
00602                 //check version
00603                 switch ($server_version) {
00604                         case CAS_VERSION_1_0:
00605                                 if ( $this->isProxy() )
00606                                         phpCAS::error('CAS proxies are not supported in CAS '
00607                                                 .$server_version);
00608                                 break;
00609                         case CAS_VERSION_2_0:
00610                                 break;
00611                         case SAML_VERSION_1_1:
00612                                 break;
00613                         default:
00614                                 phpCAS::error('this version of CAS (`'
00615                                         .$server_version
00616                                         .'\') is not supported by phpCAS '
00617                                         .phpCAS::getVersion());
00618                 }
00619                 $this->_server['version'] = $server_version;
00620                 
00621                 // check hostname
00622                 if ( empty($server_hostname) 
00623                                 || !preg_match('/[\.\d\-abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz]*/',$server_hostname) ) {
00624                         phpCAS::error('bad CAS server hostname (`'.$server_hostname.'\')');
00625                 }
00626                 $this->_server['hostname'] = $server_hostname;
00627                 
00628                 // check port
00629                 if ( $server_port == 0 
00630                         || !is_int($server_port) ) {
00631                         phpCAS::error('bad CAS server port (`'.$server_hostname.'\')');
00632                 }
00633                 $this->_server['port'] = $server_port;
00634                 
00635                 // check URI
00636                 if ( !preg_match('/[\.\d\-_abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz\/]*/',$server_uri) ) {
00637                         phpCAS::error('bad CAS server URI (`'.$server_uri.'\')');
00638                 }
00639                 // add leading and trailing `/' and remove doubles      
00640                 $server_uri = preg_replace('/\/\//','/','/'.$server_uri.'/');
00641                 $this->_server['uri'] = $server_uri;
00642                 
00643                 // set to callback mode if PgtIou and PgtId CGI GET parameters are provided 
00644                 if ( $this->isProxy() ) {
00645                         $this->setCallbackMode(!empty($_GET['pgtIou'])&&!empty($_GET['pgtId']));
00646                 }
00647                 
00648                 if ( $this->isCallbackMode() ) {
00649                         //callback mode: check that phpCAS is secured
00650                         if ( !$this->isHttps() ) {
00651                                 phpCAS::error('CAS proxies must be secured to use phpCAS; PGT\'s will not be received from the CAS server');
00652                         }
00653                 } else {
00654                         //normal mode: get ticket and remove it from CGI parameters for developpers
00655                         $ticket = (isset($_GET['ticket']) ? $_GET['ticket'] : null);
00656                         switch ($this->getServerVersion()) {
00657                                 case CAS_VERSION_1_0: // check for a Service Ticket
00658                                         if( preg_match('/^ST-/',$ticket) ) {
00659                                                 phpCAS::trace('ST \''.$ticket.'\' found');
00660                                                 //ST present
00661                                                 $this->setST($ticket);
00662                                                 //ticket has been taken into account, unset it to hide it to applications
00663                                                 unset($_GET['ticket']);
00664                                         } else if ( !empty($ticket) ) {
00665                                                 //ill-formed ticket, halt
00666                                                 phpCAS::error('ill-formed ticket found in the URL (ticket=`'.htmlentities($ticket).'\')');
00667                                         }
00668                                         break;
00669                                 case CAS_VERSION_2_0: // check for a Service or Proxy Ticket
00670                                         if( preg_match('/^[SP]T-/',$ticket) ) {
00671                                                 phpCAS::trace('ST or PT \''.$ticket.'\' found');
00672                                                 $this->setPT($ticket);
00673                                                 unset($_GET['ticket']);
00674                                         } else if ( !empty($ticket) ) {
00675                                                 //ill-formed ticket, halt
00676                                                 phpCAS::error('ill-formed ticket found in the URL (ticket=`'.htmlentities($ticket).'\')');
00677                                         } 
00678                                         break;
00679                                 case SAML_VERSION_1_1: // SAML just does Service Tickets
00680                                         if( preg_match('/^[SP]T-/',$ticket) ) {
00681                                         phpCAS::trace('SA \''.$ticket.'\' found');
00682                                         $this->setSA($ticket);
00683                                         unset($_GET['ticket']);
00684                                         } else if ( !empty($ticket) ) {
00685                                                 //ill-formed ticket, halt
00686                                                 phpCAS::error('ill-formed ticket found in the URL (ticket=`'.htmlentities($ticket).'\')');
00687                                         }
00688                                         break;
00689                         }
00690                 }
00691                 phpCAS::traceEnd();
00692         }

00735         function getUser()
00736                 {
00737                 if ( empty($this->_user) ) {
00738                         phpCAS::error('this method should be used only after '.__CLASS__.'::forceAuthentication() or '.__CLASS__.'::isAuthenticated()');
00739                 }
00740                 return $this->_user;
00741                 }

00758         var $_attributes = array();
00759 
00760         function setAttributes($attributes)     
00761                 { $this->_attributes = $attributes; }
00762                 
00763         function getAttributes() {
00764                 if ( empty($this->_user) ) { // if no user is set, there shouldn't be any attributes also...
00765                         phpCAS::error('this method should be used only after '.__CLASS__.'::forceAuthentication() or '.__CLASS__.'::isAuthenticated()');
00766                 }
00767                 return $this->_attributes;
00768         }
00769                 
00770         function hasAttributes()
00771                 { return !empty($this->_attributes); }
00772                 
00773         function hasAttribute($key)
00774                 { return (is_array($this->_attributes) && array_key_exists($key, $this->_attributes)); }
00775                 
00776         function getAttribute($key)     {
00777                 if($this->hasAttribute($key)) {
00778                         return $this->_attributes[$key];
00779                 }
00780         }
00781         
00788         function renewAuthentication(){
00789                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
00790                 // Either way, the user is authenticated by CAS
00791                 if( isset( $_SESSION['phpCAS']['auth_checked'] ) )
00792                         unset($_SESSION['phpCAS']['auth_checked']);
00793                 if ( $this->isAuthenticated() ) {
00794                         phpCAS::trace('user already authenticated; renew');
00795                         $this->redirectToCas(false,true);
00796                 } else {
00797                         $this->redirectToCas();
00798                 }
00799                 phpCAS::traceEnd();
00800         }
00801 
00808         function forceAuthentication()
00809                 {
00810                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
00811                 
00812                 if ( $this->isAuthenticated() ) {
00813                         // the user is authenticated, nothing to be done.
00814                         phpCAS::trace('no need to authenticate');
00815                         $res = TRUE;
00816                 } else {
00817                         // the user is not authenticated, redirect to the CAS server
00818                         if (isset($_SESSION['phpCAS']['auth_checked'])) {
00819                                 unset($_SESSION['phpCAS']['auth_checked']);
00820                         }
00821                         $this->redirectToCas(FALSE/* no gateway */);    
00822                         // never reached
00823                         $res = FALSE;
00824                 }
00825                 phpCAS::traceEnd($res);
00826                 return $res;
00827                 }
00828         
00835         var $_cache_times_for_auth_recheck = 0;
00836         
00844         function setCacheTimesForAuthRecheck($n)
00845                 {
00846                 $this->_cache_times_for_auth_recheck = $n;
00847                 }
00848         
00854         function checkAuthentication()
00855                 {
00856                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
00857                 
00858                 if ( $this->isAuthenticated() ) {
00859                         phpCAS::trace('user is authenticated');
00860                         $res = TRUE;
00861                 } else if (isset($_SESSION['phpCAS']['auth_checked'])) {
00862                         // the previous request has redirected the client to the CAS server with gateway=true
00863                         unset($_SESSION['phpCAS']['auth_checked']);
00864                         $res = FALSE;
00865                 } else {
00866                         //        $_SESSION['phpCAS']['auth_checked'] = true;
00867                         //          $this->redirectToCas(TRUE/* gateway */);    
00868                         //          // never reached
00869                         //          $res = FALSE;
00870                         // avoid a check against CAS on every request
00871                         if (! isset($_SESSION['phpCAS']['unauth_count']) )
00872                                 $_SESSION['phpCAS']['unauth_count'] = -2; // uninitialized
00873                         
00874                         if (($_SESSION['phpCAS']['unauth_count'] != -2 && $this->_cache_times_for_auth_recheck == -1) 
00875                                         || ($_SESSION['phpCAS']['unauth_count'] >= 0 && $_SESSION['phpCAS']['unauth_count'] < $this->_cache_times_for_auth_recheck))
00876                         {
00877                                 $res = FALSE;
00878                                 
00879                                 if ($this->_cache_times_for_auth_recheck != -1)
00880                                 {
00881                                         $_SESSION['phpCAS']['unauth_count']++;
00882                                         phpCAS::trace('user is not authenticated (cached for '.$_SESSION['phpCAS']['unauth_count'].' times of '.$this->_cache_times_for_auth_recheck.')');
00883                                 }
00884                                 else
00885                                 {
00886                                         phpCAS::trace('user is not authenticated (cached for until login pressed)');
00887                                 }
00888                         }
00889                         else
00890                         {
00891                                 $_SESSION['phpCAS']['unauth_count'] = 0;
00892                                 $_SESSION['phpCAS']['auth_checked'] = true;
00893                                 phpCAS::trace('user is not authenticated (cache reset)');
00894                                 $this->redirectToCas(TRUE/* gateway */);        
00895                                 // never reached
00896                                 $res = FALSE;
00897                         }
00898                 }
00899                 phpCAS::traceEnd($res);
00900                 return $res;
00901                 }
00902         
00911         function isAuthenticated()
00912                 {
00913                         phpCAS::traceBegin();
00914                         $res = FALSE;
00915                         $validate_url = '';
00916 
00917                         if ( $this->wasPreviouslyAuthenticated() ) {
00918                                 // the user has already (previously during the session) been
00919                                 // authenticated, nothing to be done.
00920                                 phpCAS::trace('user was already authenticated, no need to look for tickets');
00921                                 $res = TRUE;
00922                         }
00923                         else {
00924                                 if ( $this->hasST() ) {
00925                                         // if a Service Ticket was given, validate it
00926                                         phpCAS::trace('ST `'.$this->getST().'\' is present');
00927                                         $this->validateST($validate_url,$text_response,$tree_response); // if it fails, it halts
00928                                         phpCAS::trace('ST `'.$this->getST().'\' was validated');
00929                                         if ( $this->isProxy() ) {
00930                                                 $this->validatePGT($validate_url,$text_response,$tree_response); // idem
00931                                                 phpCAS::trace('PGT `'.$this->getPGT().'\' was validated');
00932                                                 $_SESSION['phpCAS']['pgt'] = $this->getPGT();
00933                                         }
00934                                         $_SESSION['phpCAS']['user'] = $this->getUser();
00935                                         $res = TRUE;
00936                                 }
00937                                 elseif ( $this->hasPT() ) {
00938                                         // if a Proxy Ticket was given, validate it
00939                                         phpCAS::trace('PT `'.$this->getPT().'\' is present');
00940                                         $this->validatePT($validate_url,$text_response,$tree_response); // note: if it fails, it halts
00941                                         phpCAS::trace('PT `'.$this->getPT().'\' was validated');
00942                                         if ( $this->isProxy() ) {
00943                                                 $this->validatePGT($validate_url,$text_response,$tree_response); // idem
00944                                                 phpCAS::trace('PGT `'.$this->getPGT().'\' was validated');
00945                                                 $_SESSION['phpCAS']['pgt'] = $this->getPGT();
00946                                         }
00947                                         $_SESSION['phpCAS']['user'] = $this->getUser();
00948                                         $res = TRUE;
00949                                 }
00950                                 elseif ( $this->hasSA() ) {
00951                                         // if we have a SAML ticket, validate it.
00952                                         phpCAS::trace('SA `'.$this->getSA().'\' is present');
00953                                         $this->validateSA($validate_url,$text_response,$tree_response); // if it fails, it halts
00954                                         phpCAS::trace('SA `'.$this->getSA().'\' was validated');
00955                                         $_SESSION['phpCAS']['user'] = $this->getUser();
00956                                         $_SESSION['phpCAS']['attributes'] = $this->getAttributes();
00957                                         $res = TRUE;
00958                                 }
00959                                 else {
00960                                         // no ticket given, not authenticated
00961                                         phpCAS::trace('no ticket found');
00962                                 }
00963                                 if ($res) {
00964                                         // if called with a ticket parameter, we need to redirect to the app without the ticket so that CAS-ification is transparent to the browser (for later POSTS)
00965                                         // most of the checks and errors should have been made now, so we're safe for redirect without masking error messages.
00966                                         header('Location: '.$this->getURL());
00967                                         phpCAS::log( "Prepare redirect to : ".$this->getURL() );
00968                                 }
00969                         }
00970 
00971                         phpCAS::traceEnd($res);
00972                         return $res;
00973                 }
00974         
00980         function isSessionAuthenticated ()
00981                 {
00982                 return !empty($_SESSION['phpCAS']['user']);
00983                 }
00984         
00995         function wasPreviouslyAuthenticated()
00996                 {
00997                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
00998                 
00999                 if ( $this->isCallbackMode() ) {
01000                         $this->callback();
01001                 }
01002                 
01003                 $auth = FALSE;
01004                 
01005                 if ( $this->isProxy() ) {
01006                         // CAS proxy: username and PGT must be present
01007                         if ( $this->isSessionAuthenticated() && !empty($_SESSION['phpCAS']['pgt']) ) {
01008                                 // authentication already done
01009                                 $this->setUser($_SESSION['phpCAS']['user']);
01010                                 $this->setPGT($_SESSION['phpCAS']['pgt']);
01011                                 phpCAS::trace('user = `'.$_SESSION['phpCAS']['user'].'\', PGT = `'.$_SESSION['phpCAS']['pgt'].'\''); 
01012                                 $auth = TRUE;
01013                         } elseif ( $this->isSessionAuthenticated() && empty($_SESSION['phpCAS']['pgt']) ) {
01014                                 // these two variables should be empty or not empty at the same time
01015                                 phpCAS::trace('username found (`'.$_SESSION['phpCAS']['user'].'\') but PGT is empty');
01016                                 // unset all tickets to enforce authentication
01017                                 unset($_SESSION['phpCAS']);
01018                                 $this->setST('');
01019                                 $this->setPT('');
01020                         } elseif ( !$this->isSessionAuthenticated() && !empty($_SESSION['phpCAS']['pgt']) ) {
01021                                 // these two variables should be empty or not empty at the same time
01022                                 phpCAS::trace('PGT found (`'.$_SESSION['phpCAS']['pgt'].'\') but username is empty'); 
01023                                 // unset all tickets to enforce authentication
01024                                 unset($_SESSION['phpCAS']);
01025                                 $this->setST('');
01026                                 $this->setPT('');
01027                         } else {
01028                                 phpCAS::trace('neither user not PGT found'); 
01029                         }
01030                 } else {
01031                         // `simple' CAS client (not a proxy): username must be present
01032                         if ( $this->isSessionAuthenticated() ) {
01033                                 // authentication already done
01034                                 $this->setUser($_SESSION['phpCAS']['user']);
01035                                 if(isset($_SESSION['phpCAS']['attributes'])){
01036                                         $this->setAttributes($_SESSION['phpCAS']['attributes']);
01037                                 }
01038                                 phpCAS::trace('user = `'.$_SESSION['phpCAS']['user'].'\''); 
01039                                 $auth = TRUE;
01040                         } else {
01041                                 phpCAS::trace('no user found');
01042                         }
01043                 }
01044                 
01045                 phpCAS::traceEnd($auth);
01046                 return $auth;
01047                 }

01056         function redirectToCas($gateway=false,$renew=false){
01057                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
01058                 $cas_url = $this->getServerLoginURL($gateway,$renew);
01059                 header('Location: '.$cas_url);
01060                 phpCAS::log( "Redirect to : ".$cas_url );
01061                 
01062                 $this->printHTMLHeader($this->getString(CAS_STR_AUTHENTICATION_WANTED));
01063                 
01064                 printf('<p>'.$this->getString(CAS_STR_SHOULD_HAVE_BEEN_REDIRECTED).'</p>',$cas_url);
01065                 $this->printHTMLFooter();
01066                 
01067                 phpCAS::traceExit();
01068                 exit();
01069         }

01094         
01100         function logout($params) {
01101                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
01102                 $cas_url = $this->getServerLogoutURL();
01103                 $paramSeparator = '?';
01104                 if (isset($params['url'])) {
01105                         $cas_url = $cas_url . $paramSeparator . "url=" . urlencode($params['url']); 
01106                         $paramSeparator = '&';
01107                 }
01108                 if (isset($params['service'])) {
01109                         $cas_url = $cas_url . $paramSeparator . "service=" . urlencode($params['service']); 
01110                 }
01111                 header('Location: '.$cas_url);
01112                 phpCAS::log( "Prepare redirect to : ".$cas_url );
01113  
01114                 session_unset();
01115                 session_destroy();
01116                 
01117                 $this->printHTMLHeader($this->getString(CAS_STR_LOGOUT));
01118                 printf('<p>'.$this->getString(CAS_STR_SHOULD_HAVE_BEEN_REDIRECTED).'</p>',$cas_url);
01119                 $this->printHTMLFooter();
01120                 
01121                 phpCAS::traceExit();
01122                 exit();
01123         }
01124         
01129         function isLogoutRequest() {
01130                 return !empty($_POST['logoutRequest']);
01131         }
01132         
01137         function isLogoutRequestAllowed() {
01138         }
01139         
01148         function handleLogoutRequests($check_client=true, $allowed_clients=false) {
01149                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
01150                 if (!$this->isLogoutRequest()) {
01151                         phpCAS::log("Not a logout request");
01152                         phpCAS::traceEnd();
01153                         return;
01154                 }
01155                 phpCAS::log("Logout requested");
01156                 phpCAS::log("SAML REQUEST: ".$_POST['logoutRequest']);
01157                 if ($check_client) {
01158                         if (!$allowed_clients) {
01159                                 $allowed_clients = array( $this->getServerHostname() ); 
01160                         }
01161                         $client_ip = $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR'];
01162                         $client = gethostbyaddr($client_ip);
01163                         phpCAS::log("Client: ".$client."/".$client_ip); 
01164                         $allowed = false;
01165                         foreach ($allowed_clients as $allowed_client) {
01166                                 if (($client == $allowed_client) or ($client_ip == $allowed_client)) { 
01167                                         phpCAS::log("Allowed client '".$allowed_client."' matches, logout request is allowed");
01168                                         $allowed = true;
01169                                         break;
01170                                 } else {
01171                                         phpCAS::log("Allowed client '".$allowed_client."' does not match");
01172                                 }
01173                         }
01174                         if (!$allowed) {
01175                                 phpCAS::error("Unauthorized logout request from client '".$client."'");
01176                             printf("Unauthorized!");
01177                                 phpCAS::traceExit();
01178                                 exit();
01179                         }
01180                 } else {
01181                         phpCAS::log("No access control set");
01182                 }
01183                 // Extract the ticket from the SAML Request
01184                 preg_match("|<samlp:SessionIndex>(.*)</samlp:SessionIndex>|", $_POST['logoutRequest'], $tick, PREG_OFFSET_CAPTURE, 3);
01185                 $wrappedSamlSessionIndex = preg_replace('|<samlp:SessionIndex>|','',$tick[0][0]);
01186                 $ticket2logout = preg_replace('|</samlp:SessionIndex>|','',$wrappedSamlSessionIndex);
01187                 phpCAS::log("Ticket to logout: ".$ticket2logout);
01188                 $session_id = preg_replace('/[^\w]/','',$ticket2logout);
01189                 phpCAS::log("Session id: ".$session_id);
01190 
01191                 // fix New session ID
01192                 session_id($session_id);
01193                 $_COOKIE[session_name()]=$session_id;
01194                 $_GET[session_name()]=$session_id;
01195                 
01196                 // Overwrite session
01197                 session_start();        
01198                 session_unset();
01199             session_destroy();
01200             printf("Disconnected!");
01201                 phpCAS::traceExit();
01202                 exit();
01203         }

01330         function validateST($validate_url,&$text_response,&$tree_response)
01331                 {
01332                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
01333                 // build the URL to validate the ticket
01334                 $validate_url = $this->getServerServiceValidateURL().'&ticket='.$this->getST();
01335                 if ( $this->isProxy() ) {
01336                         // pass the callback url for CAS proxies
01337                         $validate_url .= '&pgtUrl='.$this->getCallbackURL();
01338                 }
01339                 
01340                 // open and read the URL
01341                 if ( !$this->readURL($validate_url,''/*cookies*/,$headers,$text_response,$err_msg) ) {
01342                         phpCAS::trace('could not open URL \''.$validate_url.'\' to validate ('.$err_msg.')');
01343                         $this->authError('ST not validated',
01344                                 $validate_url,
01345                                 TRUE/*$no_response*/);
01346                 }
01347                 
01348                 // analyze the result depending on the version
01349                 switch ($this->getServerVersion()) {
01350                         case CAS_VERSION_1_0:
01351                                 if (preg_match('/^no\n/',$text_response)) {
01352                                         phpCAS::trace('ST has not been validated');
01353                                         $this->authError('ST not validated',
01354                                                 $validate_url,
01355                                                 FALSE/*$no_response*/,
01356                                                 FALSE/*$bad_response*/,
01357                                                 $text_response);
01358                                 }
01359                                 if (!preg_match('/^yes\n/',$text_response)) {
01360                                         phpCAS::trace('ill-formed response');
01361                                         $this->authError('ST not validated',
01362                                                 $validate_url,
01363                                                 FALSE/*$no_response*/,
01364                                                 TRUE/*$bad_response*/,
01365                                                 $text_response);
01366                                 }
01367                                 // ST has been validated, extract the user name
01368                                 $arr = preg_split('/\n/',$text_response);
01369                                 $this->setUser(trim($arr[1]));
01370                                 break;
01371                         case CAS_VERSION_2_0:
01372                                 // read the response of the CAS server into a DOM object
01373                                 if ( !($dom = domxml_open_mem($text_response))) {
01374                                         phpCAS::trace('domxml_open_mem() failed');
01375                                         $this->authError('ST not validated',
01376                                                 $validate_url,
01377                                                 FALSE/*$no_response*/,
01378                                                 TRUE/*$bad_response*/,
01379                                                 $text_response);
01380                                 }
01381                                 // read the root node of the XML tree
01382                                 if ( !($tree_response = $dom->document_element()) ) {
01383                                         phpCAS::trace('document_element() failed');
01384                                         $this->authError('ST not validated',
01385                                                 $validate_url,
01386                                                 FALSE/*$no_response*/,
01387                                                 TRUE/*$bad_response*/,
01388                                                 $text_response);
01389                                 }
01390                                 // insure that tag name is 'serviceResponse'
01391                                 if ( $tree_response->node_name() != 'serviceResponse' ) {
01392                                         phpCAS::trace('bad XML root node (should be `serviceResponse\' instead of `'.$tree_response->node_name().'\'');
01393                                         $this->authError('ST not validated',
01394                                                 $validate_url,
01395                                                 FALSE/*$no_response*/,
01396                                                 TRUE/*$bad_response*/,
01397                                                 $text_response);
01398                                 }
01399                                 if ( sizeof($success_elements = $tree_response->get_elements_by_tagname("authenticationSuccess")) != 0) {
01400                                         // authentication succeded, extract the user name
01401                                         if ( sizeof($user_elements = $success_elements[0]->get_elements_by_tagname("user")) == 0) {
01402                                                 phpCAS::trace('<authenticationSuccess> found, but no <user>');
01403                                                 $this->authError('ST not validated',
01404                                                         $validate_url,
01405                                                         FALSE/*$no_response*/,
01406                                                         TRUE/*$bad_response*/,
01407                                                         $text_response);
01408                                         }
01409                                         $user = trim($user_elements[0]->get_content());
01410                                         phpCAS::trace('user = `'.$user);
01411                                         $this->setUser($user);
01412                                         
01413                                 } else if ( sizeof($failure_elements = $tree_response->get_elements_by_tagname("authenticationFailure")) != 0) {
01414                                         phpCAS::trace('<authenticationFailure> found');
01415                                         // authentication failed, extract the error code and message
01416                                         $this->authError('ST not validated',
01417                                                 $validate_url,
01418                                                 FALSE/*$no_response*/,
01419                                                 FALSE/*$bad_response*/,
01420                                                 $text_response,
01421                                                 $failure_elements[0]->get_attribute('code')/*$err_code*/,
01422                                                 trim($failure_elements[0]->get_content())/*$err_msg*/);
01423                                 } else {
01424                                         phpCAS::trace('neither <authenticationSuccess> nor <authenticationFailure> found');
01425                                         $this->authError('ST not validated',
01426                                                 $validate_url,
01427                                                 FALSE/*$no_response*/,
01428                                                 TRUE/*$bad_response*/,
01429                                                 $text_response);
01430                                 }
01431                                 break;
01432                 }
01433                 
01434                 // at this step, ST has been validated and $this->_user has been set,
01435                 phpCAS::traceEnd(TRUE);
01436                 return TRUE;
01437                 }
01438 
01439  // ########################################################################
01440  //  SAML VALIDATION
01441  // ########################################################################
01460    function validateSA($validate_url,&$text_response,&$tree_response)
01461      {
01462        phpCAS::traceBegin();
01463 
01464        // build the URL to validate the ticket
01465        $validate_url = $this->getServerSamlValidateURL();
01466 
01467        // open and read the URL
01468        if ( !$this->readURL($validate_url,''/*cookies*/,$headers,$text_response,$err_msg) ) {
01469            phpCAS::trace('could not open URL \''.$validate_url.'\' to validate ('.$err_msg.')');
01470            $this->authError('SA not validated', $validate_url, TRUE/*$no_response*/);
01471        }
01472 
01473        phpCAS::trace('server version: '.$this->getServerVersion());
01474 
01475        // analyze the result depending on the version
01476        switch ($this->getServerVersion()) {
01477        case SAML_VERSION_1_1:
01478 
01479      // read the response of the CAS server into a DOM object
01480        if ( !($dom = domxml_open_mem($text_response))) {
01481          phpCAS::trace('domxml_open_mem() failed');
01482          $this->authError('SA not validated',
01483                       $validate_url,
01484                       FALSE/*$no_response*/,
01485                       TRUE/*$bad_response*/,
01486                       $text_response);
01487        }
01488        // read the root node of the XML tree
01489        if ( !($tree_response = $dom->document_element()) ) {
01490          phpCAS::trace('document_element() failed');
01491          $this->authError('SA not validated',
01492                       $validate_url,
01493                       FALSE/*$no_response*/,
01494                       TRUE/*$bad_response*/,
01495                       $text_response);
01496        }
01497        // insure that tag name is 'Envelope'
01498        if ( $tree_response->node_name() != 'Envelope' ) {
01499          phpCAS::trace('bad XML root node (should be `Envelope\' instead of `'.$tree_response->node_name().'\'');
01500          $this->authError('SA not validated',
01501                       $validate_url,
01502                       FALSE/*$no_response*/,
01503                       TRUE/*$bad_response*/,
01504                       $text_response);
01505        }
01506      // check for the NameIdentifier tag in the SAML response
01507        if ( sizeof($success_elements = $tree_response->get_elements_by_tagname("NameIdentifier")) != 0) {
01508        phpCAS::trace('NameIdentifier found');
01509          $user = trim($success_elements[0]->get_content());
01510          phpCAS::trace('user = `'.$user.'`');
01511          $this->setUser($user);
01512        $this->setSessionAttributes($text_response);
01513        } else {
01514          phpCAS::trace('no <NameIdentifier> tag found in SAML payload');
01515          $this->authError('SA not validated',
01516                       $validate_url,
01517                       FALSE/*$no_response*/,
01518                       TRUE/*$bad_response*/,
01519                       $text_response);
01520        }
01521        break;
01522        }
01523 
01524        // at this step, ST has been validated and $this->_user has been set,
01525        phpCAS::traceEnd(TRUE);
01526        return TRUE;
01527      }
01528 
01538  function setSessionAttributes($text_response)
01539  {
01540            phpCAS::traceBegin();
01541 
01542            $result = FALSE;
01543 
01544            if (isset($_SESSION[SAML_ATTRIBUTES])) {
01545              phpCAS::trace("session attrs already set.");  //testbml - do we care?
01546            }
01547 
01548            $attr_array = array();
01549 
01550                 if (($dom = domxml_open_mem($text_response))) {
01551                    $xPath = $dom->xpath_new_context();
01552                    $xPath->xpath_register_ns('samlp', 'urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:protocol');
01553                    $xPath->xpath_register_ns('saml', 'urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:assertion');
01554                    $nodelist = $xPath->xpath_eval("//saml:Attribute");
01555                    $attrs = $nodelist->nodeset;
01556                    phpCAS::trace($text_response);
01557                   foreach($attrs as $attr){
01558                       $xres = $xPath->xpath_eval("saml:AttributeValue", $attr);
01559                       $name = $attr->get_attribute("AttributeName");
01560                       $value_array = array();
01561                       foreach($xres->nodeset as $node){
01562                           $value_array[] = $node->get_content();
01563                          
01564                       }
01565                       phpCAS::trace("* " . $name . "=" . $value_array);
01566                       $attr_array[$name] = $value_array;
01567                    }
01568                    $_SESSION[SAML_ATTRIBUTES] = $attr_array;
01569                    // UGent addition...
01570                    foreach($attr_array as $attr_key => $attr_value) {
01571                       if(count($attr_value) > 1) {
01572                         $this->_attributes[$attr_key] = $attr_value;
01573                       }
01574                       else {
01575                         $this->_attributes[$attr_key] = $attr_value[0];
01576                       }
01577                    }
01578                    $result = TRUE;
01579                 }
01580        phpCAS::traceEnd($result);
01581        return $result;
01582  }

01708                 return $this->_callback_mode;
01709                 }
01710         
01719         var $_callback_url = '';
01720         
01730         function getCallbackURL()
01731                 {
01732                 // the URL is built when needed only
01733                 if ( empty($this->_callback_url) ) {
01734                         $final_uri = '';
01735                         // remove the ticket if present in the URL
01736                         $final_uri = 'https://';
01737                         /* replaced by Julien Marchal - v0.4.6
01738                          * $this->uri .= $_SERVER['SERVER_NAME'];
01739                          */
01740                         if(empty($_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED_SERVER'])){
01741                                 /* replaced by teedog - v0.4.12
01742                                  * $final_uri .= $_SERVER['SERVER_NAME'];
01743                                  */
01744                                 if (empty($_SERVER['SERVER_NAME'])) {
01745                                         $final_uri .= $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'];
01746                                 } else {
01747                                         $final_uri .= $_SERVER['SERVER_NAME'];
01748                                 }
01749                         } else {
01750                                 $final_uri .= $_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED_SERVER'];
01751                         }
01752                         if ( ($this->isHttps() && $_SERVER['SERVER_PORT']!=443)
01753                                         || (!$this->isHttps() && $_SERVER['SERVER_PORT']!=80) ) {
01754                                 $final_uri .= ':';
01755                                 $final_uri .= $_SERVER['SERVER_PORT'];
01756                         }
01757                         $request_uri = $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'];
01758                         $request_uri = preg_replace('/\?.*$/','',$request_uri);
01759                         $final_uri .= $request_uri;
01760                         $this->setCallbackURL($final_uri);
01761                 }
01762                 return $this->_callback_url;
01763                 }
01764         
01772         function setCallbackURL($url)
01773                 {
01774                 return $this->_callback_url = $url;
01775                 }
01776         
01783         function callback()
01784                 {
01785                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
01786                 $this->printHTMLHeader('phpCAS callback');
01787                 $pgt_iou = $_GET['pgtIou'];
01788                 $pgt = $_GET['pgtId'];
01789                 phpCAS::trace('Storing PGT `'.$pgt.'\' (id=`'.$pgt_iou.'\')');
01790                 echo '<p>Storing PGT `'.$pgt.'\' (id=`'.$pgt_iou.'\').</p>';
01791                 $this->storePGT($pgt,$pgt_iou);
01792                 $this->printHTMLFooter();
01793                 phpCAS::traceExit();
01794                 exit();
01795                 }
01796         
01799         // ########################################################################
01800         //  PGT STORAGE
01801         // ########################################################################
01815         var $_pgt_storage = null;
01816         
01823         function initPGTStorage()
01824                 {
01825                 // if no SetPGTStorageXxx() has been used, default to file
01826                 if ( !is_object($this->_pgt_storage) ) {
01827                         $this->setPGTStorageFile();
01828                 }
01829                 
01830                 // initializes the storage
01831                 $this->_pgt_storage->init();
01832                 }
01833         
01842         function storePGT($pgt,$pgt_iou)
01843                 {
01844                 // ensure that storage is initialized
01845                 $this->initPGTStorage();
01846                 // writes the PGT
01847                 $this->_pgt_storage->write($pgt,$pgt_iou);
01848                 }
01849         
01859         function loadPGT($pgt_iou)
01860                 {
01861                 // ensure that storage is initialized
01862                 $this->initPGTStorage();
01863                 // read the PGT
01864                 return $this->_pgt_storage->read($pgt_iou);
01865                 }
01866         
01876         function setPGTStorageFile($format='',
01877                 $path='')
01878                 {
01879                 // check that the storage has not already been set
01880                 if ( is_object($this->_pgt_storage) ) {
01881                         phpCAS::error('PGT storage already defined');
01882                 }
01883                 
01884                 // create the storage object
01885                 $this->_pgt_storage = new PGTStorageFile($this,$format,$path);
01886                 }
01887         
01905         function setPGTStorageDB($user,
01906                                                          $password,
01907                                                          $database_type,
01908                                                          $hostname,
01909                                                          $port,
01910                                                          $database,
01911                                                          $table)
01912                 {
01913                 // check that the storage has not already been set
01914                 if ( is_object($this->_pgt_storage) ) {
01915                         phpCAS::error('PGT storage already defined');
01916                 }
01917                 
01918                 // warn the user that he should use file storage...
01919                 trigger_error('PGT storage into database is an experimental feature, use at your own risk',E_USER_WARNING);
01920                 
01921                 // create the storage object
01922                 $this->_pgt_storage = new PGTStorageDB($this,$user,$password,$database_type,$hostname,$port,$database,$table);
01923                 }

01925         // ########################################################################
01926         //  PGT VALIDATION
01927         // ########################################################################
01941         function validatePGT(&$validate_url,$text_response,$tree_response)
01942                 {
01943                 // here cannot use phpCAS::traceBegin(); alongside domxml-php4-to-php5.php
01944                 phpCAS::log('start validatePGT()');
01945                 if ( sizeof($arr = $tree_response->get_elements_by_tagname("proxyGrantingTicket")) == 0) {
01946                         phpCAS::trace('<proxyGrantingTicket> not found');
01947                         // authentication succeded, but no PGT Iou was transmitted
01948                         $this->authError('Ticket validated but no PGT Iou transmitted',
01949                                 $validate_url,
01950                                 FALSE/*$no_response*/,
01951                                 FALSE/*$bad_response*/,
01952                                 $text_response);
01953                 } else {
01954                         // PGT Iou transmitted, extract it
01955                         $pgt_iou = trim($arr[0]->get_content());
01956                         $pgt = $this->loadPGT($pgt_iou);
01957                         if ( $pgt == FALSE ) {
01958                                 phpCAS::trace('could not load PGT');
01959                                 $this->authError('PGT Iou was transmitted but PGT could not be retrieved',
01960                                         $validate_url,
01961                                         FALSE/*$no_response*/,
01962                                         FALSE/*$bad_response*/,
01963                                         $text_response);
01964                         }
01965                         $this->setPGT($pgt);
01966                 }
01967                 // here, cannot use     phpCAS::traceEnd(TRUE); alongside domxml-php4-to-php5.php
01968                 phpCAS::log('end validatePGT()');
01969                 return TRUE;
01970                 }
01971         
01972         // ########################################################################
01973         //  PGT VALIDATION
01974         // ########################################################################
01975         
01987         function retrievePT($target_service,&$err_code,&$err_msg)
01988                 {
01989                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
01990                 
01991                 // by default, $err_msg is set empty and $pt to TRUE. On error, $pt is
01992                 // set to false and $err_msg to an error message. At the end, if $pt is FALSE 
01993                 // and $error_msg is still empty, it is set to 'invalid response' (the most
01994                 // commonly encountered error).
01995                 $err_msg = '';
01996                 
01997                 // build the URL to retrieve the PT
01998                 //      $cas_url = $this->getServerProxyURL().'?targetService='.preg_replace('/&/','%26',$target_service).'&pgt='.$this->getPGT();
01999                 $cas_url = $this->getServerProxyURL().'?targetService='.urlencode($target_service).'&pgt='.$this->getPGT();
02000                 
02001                 // open and read the URL
02002                 if ( !$this->readURL($cas_url,''/*cookies*/,$headers,$cas_response,$err_msg) ) {
02003                         phpCAS::trace('could not open URL \''.$cas_url.'\' to validate ('.$err_msg.')');
02004                         $err_code = PHPCAS_SERVICE_PT_NO_SERVER_RESPONSE;
02005                         $err_msg = 'could not retrieve PT (no response from the CAS server)';
02006                         phpCAS::traceEnd(FALSE);
02007                         return FALSE;
02008                 }
02009                 
02010                 $bad_response = FALSE;
02011                 
02012                 if ( !$bad_response ) {
02013                         // read the response of the CAS server into a DOM object
02014                         if ( !($dom = @domxml_open_mem($cas_response))) {
02015                                 phpCAS::trace('domxml_open_mem() failed');
02016                                 // read failed
02017                                 $bad_response = TRUE;
02018                         } 
02019                 }
02020                 
02021                 if ( !$bad_response ) {
02022                         // read the root node of the XML tree
02023                         if ( !($root = $dom->document_element()) ) {
02024                                 phpCAS::trace('document_element() failed');
02025                                 // read failed
02026                                 $bad_response = TRUE;
02027                         } 
02028                 }
02029                 
02030                 if ( !$bad_response ) {
02031                         // insure that tag name is 'serviceResponse'
02032                         if ( $root->node_name() != 'serviceResponse' ) {
02033                                 phpCAS::trace('node_name() failed');
02034                                 // bad root node
02035                                 $bad_response = TRUE;
02036                         } 
02037                 }
02038                 
02039                 if ( !$bad_response ) {
02040                         // look for a proxySuccess tag
02041                         if ( sizeof($arr = $root->get_elements_by_tagname("proxySuccess")) != 0) {
02042                                 // authentication succeded, look for a proxyTicket tag
02043                                 if ( sizeof($arr = $root->get_elements_by_tagname("proxyTicket")) != 0) {
02044                                         $err_code = PHPCAS_SERVICE_OK;
02045                                         $err_msg = '';
02046                                         phpCAS::trace('original PT: '.trim($arr[0]->get_content()));
02047                                         $pt = trim($arr[0]->get_content());
02048                                         phpCAS::traceEnd($pt);
02049                                         return $pt;
02050                                 } else {
02051                                         phpCAS::trace('<proxySuccess> was found, but not <proxyTicket>');
02052                                 }
02053                         } 
02054                         // look for a proxyFailure tag
02055                         else if ( sizeof($arr = $root->get_elements_by_tagname("proxyFailure")) != 0) {
02056                                 // authentication failed, extract the error
02057                                 $err_code = PHPCAS_SERVICE_PT_FAILURE;
02058                                 $err_msg = 'PT retrieving failed (code=`'
02059                                         .$arr[0]->get_attribute('code')
02060                                         .'\', message=`'
02061                                         .trim($arr[0]->get_content())
02062                                         .'\')';
02063                                 phpCAS::traceEnd(FALSE);
02064                                 return FALSE;
02065                         } else {
02066                                 phpCAS::trace('neither <proxySuccess> nor <proxyFailure> found');
02067                         }
02068                 }
02069                 
02070                 // at this step, we are sure that the response of the CAS server was ill-formed
02071                 $err_code = PHPCAS_SERVICE_PT_BAD_SERVER_RESPONSE;
02072                 $err_msg = 'Invalid response from the CAS server (response=`'.$cas_response.'\')';
02073                 
02074                 phpCAS::traceEnd(FALSE);
02075                 return FALSE;
02076                 }
02077         
02078         // ########################################################################
02079         // ACCESS TO EXTERNAL SERVICES
02080         // ########################################################################
02081         
02097         function readURL($url,$cookies,&$headers,&$body,&$err_msg)
02098                 {
02099                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
02100                 $headers = '';
02101                 $body = '';
02102                 $err_msg = '';
02103                 
02104                 $res = TRUE;
02105                 
02106                 // initialize the CURL session
02107                 $ch = curl_init($url);
02108                 
02109                 if (version_compare(PHP_VERSION,'5.1.3','>=')) {
02110                         //only avaible in php5
02111                         curl_setopt_array($ch, $this->_curl_options);
02112                 } else {
02113                         foreach ($this->_curl_options as $key => $value) {
02114                                 curl_setopt($ch, $key, $value);
02115                         }
02116                 }
02117 
02118                 if ($this->_cas_server_cert == '' && $this->_cas_server_ca_cert == '' && !$this->_no_cas_server_validation) {
02119                         phpCAS::error('one of the methods phpCAS::setCasServerCert(), phpCAS::setCasServerCACert() or phpCAS::setNoCasServerValidation() must be called.');
02120                 }
02121                 if ($this->_cas_server_cert != '' && $this->_cas_server_ca_cert != '') {
02122                         // This branch added by IDMS. Seems phpCAS implementor got a bit confused about the curl options CURLOPT_SSLCERT and CURLOPT_CAINFO
02123                         curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, 1);
02124                         curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, 1);
02125                         curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSLCERT, $this->_cas_server_cert);
02126                         curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CAINFO, $this->_cas_server_ca_cert);
02127                         curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, '1');
02128                         phpCAS::trace('CURL: Set all required opts for mutual authentication ------');
02129                 } else if ($this->_cas_server_cert != '' ) {
02130                         curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, 1);
02131                         curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSLCERT, $this->_cas_server_cert);
02132                 } else if ($this->_cas_server_ca_cert != '') {
02133                         curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, 1);
02134                         curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CAINFO, $this->_cas_server_ca_cert);
02135                 } else {
02136                         curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, 1);
02137                         curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, 0);
02138                 }
02139                 
02140                 // return the CURL output into a variable
02141                 curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);
02142                 // get the HTTP header with a callback
02143                 $this->_curl_headers = array(); // empty the headers array
02144                 curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADERFUNCTION, array($this, '_curl_read_headers'));
02145                 // add cookies headers
02146                 if ( is_array($cookies) ) {
02147                         curl_setopt($ch,CURLOPT_COOKIE,implode(';',$cookies));
02148                 }
02149                 // add extra stuff if SAML
02150                 if ($this->hasSA()) {
02151                         $more_headers = array ("soapaction: http://www.oasis-open.org/committees/security",
02152                                                "cache-control: no-cache",
02153                                                "pragma: no-cache",
02154                                                "accept: text/xml",
02155                                                "connection: keep-alive",
02156                                                "content-type: text/xml");
02157 
02158                        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $more_headers);
02159                        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, 1);
02160                        $data = $this->buildSAMLPayload();
02161                        //phpCAS::trace('SAML Payload: '.print_r($data, TRUE));
02162                        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
02163                 }
02164                 // perform the query
02165                 $buf = curl_exec ($ch);
02166                 //phpCAS::trace('CURL: Call completed. Response body is: \''.$buf.'\'');
02167                 if ( $buf === FALSE ) {
02168                         phpCAS::trace('curl_exec() failed');
02169                         $err_msg = 'CURL error #'.curl_errno($ch).': '.curl_error($ch);
02170                         //phpCAS::trace('curl error: '.$err_msg);
02171                         // close the CURL session
02172                         curl_close ($ch);
02173                         $res = FALSE;
02174                 } else {
02175                         // close the CURL session
02176                         curl_close ($ch);
02177                         
02178                         $headers = $this->_curl_headers;
02179                         $body = $buf;
02180                 }
02181                 
02182                 phpCAS::traceEnd($res);
02183                 return $res;
02184         }
02185 
02193         function buildSAMLPayload()
02194         {
02195         phpCAS::traceBegin();
02196 
02197         //get the ticket
02198         $sa = $this->getSA();
02199         //phpCAS::trace("SA: ".$sa);
02200 
02201         $body=SAML_SOAP_ENV.SAML_SOAP_BODY.SAMLP_REQUEST.SAML_ASSERTION_ARTIFACT.$sa.SAML_ASSERTION_ARTIFACT_CLOSE.SAMLP_REQUEST_CLOSE.SAML_SOAP_BODY_CLOSE.SAML_SOAP_ENV_CLOSE;
02202 
02203         phpCAS::traceEnd($body);
02204         return ($body);
02205         }
02206 
02210         var $_curl_headers = array();
02211         function _curl_read_headers($ch, $header)
02212         {
02213                 $this->_curl_headers[] = $header;
02214                 return strlen($header);
02215         }
02216 
02232         function serviceWeb($url,&$err_code,&$output)
02233                 {
02234                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
02235                 // at first retrieve a PT
02236                 $pt = $this->retrievePT($url,$err_code,$output);
02237                 
02238                 $res = TRUE;
02239                 
02240                 // test if PT was retrieved correctly
02241                 if ( !$pt ) {
02242                         // note: $err_code and $err_msg are filled by CASClient::retrievePT()
02243                         phpCAS::trace('PT was not retrieved correctly');
02244                         $res = FALSE;
02245                 } else {
02246                         // add cookies if necessary
02247                         if ( is_array($_SESSION['phpCAS']['services'][$url]['cookies']) ) {
02248                                 foreach ( $_SESSION['phpCAS']['services'][$url]['cookies'] as $name => $val ) { 
02249                                         $cookies[] = $name.'='.$val;
02250                                 }
02251                         }
02252                         
02253                         // build the URL including the PT
02254                         if ( strstr($url,'?') === FALSE ) {
02255                                 $service_url = $url.'?ticket='.$pt;
02256                         } else {
02257                                 $service_url = $url.'&ticket='.$pt;
02258                         }
02259                         
02260                         phpCAS::trace('reading URL`'.$service_url.'\'');
02261                         if ( !$this->readURL($service_url,$cookies,$headers,$output,$err_msg) ) {
02262                                 phpCAS::trace('could not read URL`'.$service_url.'\'');
02263                                 $err_code = PHPCAS_SERVICE_NOT_AVAILABLE;
02264                                 // give an error message
02265                                 $output = sprintf($this->getString(CAS_STR_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE),
02266                                         $service_url,
02267                                         $err_msg);
02268                                 $res = FALSE;
02269                         } else {
02270                                 // URL has been fetched, extract the cookies
02271                                 phpCAS::trace('URL`'.$service_url.'\' has been read, storing cookies:');
02272                                 foreach ( $headers as $header ) {
02273                                         // test if the header is a cookie
02274                                         if ( preg_match('/^Set-Cookie:/',$header) ) {
02275                                                 // the header is a cookie, remove the beginning
02276                                                 $header_val = preg_replace('/^Set-Cookie: */','',$header);
02277                                                 // extract interesting information
02278                                                 $name_val = strtok($header_val,'; ');
02279                                                 // extract the name and the value of the cookie
02280                                                 $cookie_name = strtok($name_val,'=');
02281                                                 $cookie_val = strtok('=');
02282                                                 // store the cookie 
02283                                                 $_SESSION['phpCAS']['services'][$url]['cookies'][$cookie_name] = $cookie_val;
02284                                                 phpCAS::trace($cookie_name.' -> '.$cookie_val);
02285                                         }
02286                                 }
02287                         }
02288                 }
02289                 
02290                 phpCAS::traceEnd($res);
02291                 return $res;
02292                 }
02293         
02313         function serviceMail($url,$service,$flags,&$err_code,&$err_msg,&$pt)
02314                 {
02315                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
02316                 // at first retrieve a PT
02317                 $pt = $this->retrievePT($service,$err_code,$output);
02318                 
02319                 $stream = FALSE;
02320                 
02321                 // test if PT was retrieved correctly
02322                 if ( !$pt ) {
02323                         // note: $err_code and $err_msg are filled by CASClient::retrievePT()
02324                         phpCAS::trace('PT was not retrieved correctly');
02325                 } else {
02326                         phpCAS::trace('opening IMAP URL `'.$url.'\'...');
02327                         $stream = @imap_open($url,$this->getUser(),$pt,$flags);
02328                         if ( !$stream ) {
02329                                 phpCAS::trace('could not open URL');
02330                                 $err_code = PHPCAS_SERVICE_NOT_AVAILABLE;
02331                                 // give an error message
02332                                 $err_msg = sprintf($this->getString(CAS_STR_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE),
02333                                         $service_url,
02334                                         var_export(imap_errors(),TRUE));
02335                                 $pt = FALSE;
02336                                 $stream = FALSE;
02337                         } else {
02338                                 phpCAS::trace('ok');
02339                         }
02340                 }
02341                 
02342                 phpCAS::traceEnd($stream);
02343                 return $stream;
02344                 }
