02423         // ########################################################################
02424         //  PT VALIDATION
02425         // ########################################################################
02438         function validatePT(&$validate_url,&$text_response,&$tree_response)
02439                 {
02440                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
02441                 // build the URL to validate the ticket
02442                 $validate_url = $this->getServerProxyValidateURL().'&ticket='.$this->getPT();
02443                 
02444                 if ( $this->isProxy() ) {
02445                         // pass the callback url for CAS proxies
02446                         $validate_url .= '&pgtUrl='.$this->getCallbackURL();
02447                 }
02448                 
02449                 // open and read the URL
02450                 if ( !$this->readURL($validate_url,''/*cookies*/,$headers,$text_response,$err_msg) ) {
02451                         phpCAS::trace('could not open URL \''.$validate_url.'\' to validate ('.$err_msg.')');
02452                         $this->authError('PT not validated',
02453                                 $validate_url,
02454                                 TRUE/*$no_response*/);
02455                 }
02456                 
02457                 // read the response of the CAS server into a DOM object
02458                 if ( !($dom = domxml_open_mem($text_response))) {
02459                         // read failed
02460                         $this->authError('PT not validated',
02461                                 $validate_url,
02462                                 FALSE/*$no_response*/,
02463                                 TRUE/*$bad_response*/,
02464                                 $text_response);
02465                 }
02466                 // read the root node of the XML tree
02467                 if ( !($tree_response = $dom->document_element()) ) {
02468                         // read failed
02469                         $this->authError('PT not validated',
02470                                 $validate_url,
02471                                 FALSE/*$no_response*/,
02472                                 TRUE/*$bad_response*/,
02473                                 $text_response);
02474                 }
02475                 // insure that tag name is 'serviceResponse'
02476                 if ( $tree_response->node_name() != 'serviceResponse' ) {
02477                         // bad root node
02478                         $this->authError('PT not validated',
02479                                 $validate_url,
02480                                 FALSE/*$no_response*/,
02481                                 TRUE/*$bad_response*/,
02482                                 $text_response);
02483                 }
02484                 if ( sizeof($arr = $tree_response->get_elements_by_tagname("authenticationSuccess")) != 0) {
02485                         // authentication succeded, extract the user name
02486                         if ( sizeof($arr = $tree_response->get_elements_by_tagname("user")) == 0) {
02487                                 // no user specified => error
02488                                 $this->authError('PT not validated',
02489                                         $validate_url,
02490                                         FALSE/*$no_response*/,
02491                                         TRUE/*$bad_response*/,
02492                                         $text_response);
02493                         }
02494                         $this->setUser(trim($arr[0]->get_content()));
02495                         
02496                 } else if ( sizeof($arr = $tree_response->get_elements_by_tagname("authenticationFailure")) != 0) {
02497                         // authentication succeded, extract the error code and message
02498                         $this->authError('PT not validated',
02499                                 $validate_url,
02500                                 FALSE/*$no_response*/,
02501                                 FALSE/*$bad_response*/,
02502                                 $text_response,
02503                                 $arr[0]->get_attribute('code')/*$err_code*/,
02504                                 trim($arr[0]->get_content())/*$err_msg*/);
02505                 } else {
02506                         $this->authError('PT not validated',
02507                                 $validate_url,  
02508                                 FALSE/*$no_response*/,
02509                                 TRUE/*$bad_response*/,
02510                                 $text_response);
02511                 }
02512                 
02513                 // at this step, PT has been validated and $this->_user has been set,
02514                 
02515                 phpCAS::traceEnd(TRUE);
02516                 return TRUE;
02517                 }
02518         
02521         // XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
02522         // XX                                                                    XX
02523         // XX                               MISC                                 XX
02524         // XX                                                                    XX
02525         // XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
02526         
02532         // ########################################################################
02533         //  URL
02534         // ########################################################################
02542         var $_url = '';
02543         
02552         function getURL()
02553                 {
02554                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
02555                 // the URL is built when needed only
02556                 if ( empty($this->_url) ) {
02557                         $final_uri = '';
02558                         // remove the ticket if present in the URL
02559                         $final_uri = ($this->isHttps()) ? 'https' : 'http';
02560                         $final_uri .= '://';
02561                         /* replaced by Julien Marchal - v0.4.6
02562                          * $this->_url .= $_SERVER['SERVER_NAME'];
02563                          */
02564                         if(empty($_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED_SERVER'])){
02565                                 /* replaced by teedog - v0.4.12
02566                                  * $this->_url .= $_SERVER['SERVER_NAME'];
02567                                  */
02568                                 if (empty($_SERVER['SERVER_NAME'])) {
02569                                         $server_name = $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'];
02570                                 } else {
02571                                         $server_name = $_SERVER['SERVER_NAME'];
02572                                 }
02573                         } else {
02574                                 $server_name = $_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED_SERVER'];
02575                         }
02576                         $final_uri .= $server_name;
02577                         if (!strpos($server_name, ':')) {
02578                                 if ( ($this->isHttps() && $_SERVER['SERVER_PORT']!=443)
02579                                                 || (!$this->isHttps() && $_SERVER['SERVER_PORT']!=80) ) {
02580                                         $final_uri .= ':';
02581                                         $final_uri .= $_SERVER['SERVER_PORT'];
02582                                 }
02583                         }
02584                         
02585                         $baseurl = explode("?", $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'], 2);
02586                         $final_uri .= $baseurl[0];
02587                         $query_string = '';
02588                         if ($_GET) {
02589                                 $kv = array();
02590                                 foreach ($_GET as $key => $value) {
02591                                         if($key !== "ticket"){
02592                                                 $kv[] = urlencode($key). "=" . urlencode($value);
02593                                         }
02594                                 }
02595                                 $query_string = join("&", $kv);
02596                         }
02597                         if($query_string){
02598                                 $final_uri .= "?" . $query_string;
02599                         }
02600                         $this->setURL($final_uri);
02601                 }
02602                 phpCAS::traceEnd($this->_url);
02603                 return $this->_url;
02604                 }
02605         
02613         function setURL($url)
02614                 {
02615                 $this->_url = $url;
02616                 }
02617         
02618         // ########################################################################
02619         //  AUTHENTICATION ERROR HANDLING
02620         // ########################################################################
02636         function authError($failure,$cas_url,$no_response,$bad_response='',$cas_response='',$err_code='',$err_msg='')
02637                 {
02638                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
02639                 
02640                 $this->printHTMLHeader($this->getString(CAS_STR_AUTHENTICATION_FAILED));
02641                 printf($this->getString(CAS_STR_YOU_WERE_NOT_AUTHENTICATED),$this->getURL(),$_SERVER['SERVER_ADMIN']);
02642                 phpCAS::trace('CAS URL: '.$cas_url);
02643                 phpCAS::trace('Authentication failure: '.$failure);
02644                 if ( $no_response ) {
02645                         phpCAS::trace('Reason: no response from the CAS server');
02646                 } else {
02647                         if ( $bad_response ) {
02648                                 phpCAS::trace('Reason: bad response from the CAS server');
02649                         } else {
02650                                 switch ($this->getServerVersion()) {
02651                                         case CAS_VERSION_1_0:
02652                                                 phpCAS::trace('Reason: CAS error');
02653                                                 break;
02654                                         case CAS_VERSION_2_0:
02655                                                 if ( empty($err_code) )
02656                                                         phpCAS::trace('Reason: no CAS error');
02657                                                 else
02658                                                         phpCAS::trace('Reason: ['.$err_code.'] CAS error: '.$err_msg);
02659                                                 break;
02660                                 }
02661                         }
02662                         phpCAS::trace('CAS response: '.$cas_response);
02663                 }
02664                 $this->printHTMLFooter();
02665                 phpCAS::traceExit();
02666                 exit();
02667                 }
